Text:
This is bullshit. There isn't even an .exe app to start the fucking thing and if I cut/paste a crack from the actual rFactor game, it crashes at the track loading screen.

Anyone got this thing to actually work? Post how you did it please.

mtlnascarfan: If this is the SAME NASCAR Black Edition I downloaded awhile back, all I did was copy everything into my rfactor directory, over-writing all files and when I launched the game.......I had the option to run F1 or NASCAR. There WAS no installation.
